column5: The full story on my recent ice fishing trip to Winoga Lodge is now done. No giant fish, but crazy numbers each day and just a ton of fun! Fairly sure I saw more fish hooked in 3 days of ice fishing than the previous 10 years combined.Really broke up the winter for me, and was WAY more enjoyable than lying on a beach for this guy. My apologies once again to Gord about the fire on the ice thing. http://www.canadafishingguide.net/wi...ing-at-winoga/
Congrats nice trip Mike - look forward to this summers trip reports.
Thanks! This season should be a good one.
